articles.author: Analysis by Brad Lendon, CNN
articles.title: Russian Navy's massive submarine could set the stage for 'a new Cold war'
articles.description: The Russian Navy has taken delivery of what is the world's longest known submarine, one its maker touts as a research vessel -- but what others say is a platform for espionage and possibly nuclear weapons.

articles.author: Brian Stelter, CNN Business
articles.title: Murdoch's New York Post publishes scathing critique of Donald Trump
articles.description: Two of Donald Trump's favorite newspapers — controlled by his media ally Rupert Murdoch — deem Trump "unworthy" and a failure after hearings

articles.title: See George Conway's reaction to Trump's reported plan if he wins again - CNN Video
articles.description: George Conway reacts to Axios reporting that Trump and his allies are secretly making plans to fire thousands of career civil servants and install Trump loyalists if he wins the presidential election in 2024.

articles.title: 'There is potential to lose': US Air Force chief of staff on keeping pace with China - CNN Video
articles.description: Gen. Charles Q. Brown, Jr. tells Amanpour about his efforts to reform the institution to address the rise of China and a notable lack of diversity.

articles.title: First on CNN: Secret Service identified potential missing text messages on phones of 10 individuals
